extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.title: Vocabulary is cut short
reviews.comment: The female speaker consistently has her voice cut short. Occasionally the male does as well. For this reason I\'d never spend a penny on the full application.
reviews.author: Catherine Kurth

reviews.title: Random
reviews.comment: Just reads out random French words with no English translation. Some of the photos are very vague
reviews.author: Alex McGlaughlin

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: It only had a bunch of random words and sentences without explaining the language
reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Superb
reviews.author: arun lord

reviews.title: Bull shark
reviews.comment: Bull shark
reviews.author: Dejiah Causey

reviews.title: Original idea and it works
reviews.comment: Give it a chance..forces you into immersion. It helps to have some prior experience with the language. Naysayers r wrong. This program does what it says.
reviews.author: Bennet Drover

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Gives lessons here and there.  What\'s the use lessons 1,15&30. Atleast give me 1,2&3 so I can get something out of this app.
reviews.author: Mahint\'an S

reviews.title: Too few classes under the free ones.
reviews.comment: Skips classes. U won\'t know what is going on when u see the sentences. But i like the pictures...although can be unclear without English words. For instance u will have to guess the picture shows \'sugar\' not \'salt\'
reviews.author: adele neo

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Absolutely terrible app also has a very misleading title. Half the time you don\'t know what element of the picture the recorded voice is referring to. And besides, just firing  a load of random words at me does not constitute teaching French. What about learning how to put different words together to form useful sentences etc. Seriously don\'t waste your time with this app
reviews.author: Roger Hardbattle

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Useless and rip off
reviews.author: Enkhchimeg Nanzad

reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: salvador ruiz

reviews.title: nearly identical to rosetta stone
reviews.comment: This app is using the same technique as Rosetta Stone...basically a visual Pimsleur approach.  This is a fantastic app!
reviews.author: Katherine O\'connor

reviews.title: Ok, mais...
reviews.comment: Ok, but would not pay. Assez bon, mais je ne paierai pas.
reviews.author: Aris Kakstans

reviews.comment: Pretty good but wish u could have an English on/off option, other than that its a good app. For those who can\'t figure out how to do the c, for some phones hold down the c( and any other letter) and other versions of the letters should come up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: VERY GOOD
reviews.comment: This app is one way to learn French. I have learned it and j\'aime beaucoup yay!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I really like this app, i speak portuguese already and dont need translation since the words are very similar!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for beginners
reviews.comment: Doesnt give you any translation at all just a picture
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: writing issues
reviews.comment: when typing without t9 for quiz in writing mode, before I double tap for something else, it considers only t letter tapped first and increases the error percentage or Wtever its called. Needs translation, at least English translation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great French App!
reviews.comment: My daughter is impressed with my accent that she once mocked. Im able to help her with her schooling now! Thank you so much! Recommendation: give a pop up button for extra French characters/letters. Will buy when I have completed these lessons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not descriptive enough
reviews.comment: I took French in high school, and this is nothing like that. The word is paired with a picture that could mean multiple things. I\'ve heard Rosetta stone is like this. If you really want to understand French, don\'t get this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
